outboxLag.query:
Command failed: psql "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as pending_count, MAX(created_at) as oldest_pending FROM outbox WHERE status = 'pending' AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes';"
'psql' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

queries.highErrorRate: SELECT COUNT(*) as error_count FROM logs WHERE level = 'error' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour';
queries.slowQueries: SELECT COUNT(*) as slow_count FROM logs WHERE response_time > 5000 AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour';
queries.dlqFailures: SELECT COUNT(*) as dlq_count FROM dead_letter_queue WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour';
queries.authFailures: SELECT COUNT(*) as auth_failures FROM auth_logs WHERE success = false AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour';
